basics.name: Hao Doan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced senior software engineer with 9+ years of full software development lifecycle expertise. Proven success leading teams to deliver world-class solutions that increase business efficiency. Passionate about learning new skills and refining code bases. Proficient in various programming languages, frameworks, and tools, with a keen eye for detail. Committed to delivering high-quality software solutions that exceed expectations and drive business success.

work.summary: As a key contributor at Presight, I collaborated on building and maintaining complex data modeling systems, focusing on implementing functionalities and optimizing system performance. I played a pivotal role in infrastructure management, deploying and migrating Kubernetes-based solutions across on-premises and cloud environments (AWS and GCP), while ensuring robust CI/CD pipelines and server management for development teams. My work included enhancing application performance by resolving issues like slow rendering and memory leaks, developing advanced caching for time-series data, and upgrading legacy data pipelines with custom connectors for efficient delta syncing. Leveraging tools like Airbyte, Dagster, and AWS Glue, I ensured seamless data ingestion and processing, delivering scalable and reliable solutions to meet customer needs.
highlights: Collaborated with a team to develop and implement functionalities for advanced data modeling systems, enabling users to process and analyze diverse datasets, with contributions later refined by team-driven feature updates.

Designed and deployed on-premises Kubernetes (K8s) clusters and optimized CI/CD pipelines to enhance application scalability and deployment efficiency. Partially migrated infrastructure from AWS to GCP, transitioning from Docker to GCP K8s, and implemented a hybrid K8s solution for failover to cloud resources. Managed physical servers to support internal development teams.

Diagnosed and resolved performance bottlenecks in data-heavy applications with extensive charts and tables, addressing slow load times, memory leaks, and rendering issues by optimizing UI rendering (e.g., hiding non-visible UI elements) and streamlining main thread processes.
Implemented a sophisticated caching system for time-series data, accelerating query performance to customer databases and improving application responsiveness.

Maintained and upgraded a legacy data pipeline using Airbyte, Dagster, and AWS Glue to ingest customer data from MongoDB to BigQuery and AWS Athena. Developed custom Airbyte connectors to enable delta sync from MongoDB to BigQuery and implemented delta sync from BigQuery to Athena for flattened data structures.

work.summary: At Ecoation, I worked across multiple technology stacks, including web, mobile, backend, and CI/CD. Notably, I resolved a longstanding performance bug and collaborated effectively with colleagues from various departments to deliver multiple successful projects.
highlights: Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development with React and TypeScript, including Redux state management and custom UI components with styled-components.
Contributed to the development of a responsive and user-friendly mobile application with React Native libraries to improve performance and user experience.
Leveraged AWS Cognito for secure user authentication and authorization across web and mobile applications.
Developed a GraphQL API with NestJS, utilizing TypeScript and hosted on AWS, with efficient data storage and retrieval managed by DynamoDB.
Designed and implemented GraphQL resolvers to enable seamless integration between frontend and backend.
Possess skills necessary for delivering high-quality, scalable, and reliable applications with expertise in React, TypeScript, AWS, NestJS, and GraphQL.

work.summary: I was responsible for leading the architectural design and development efforts for a new SAAS application in the food delivery space at Deliany. Utilizing Next.js, GraphQL, and Elixir, I successfully led a team of five engineers and QA professionals in delivering a platform with seamless functionality and exceptional user experience across multiple platforms. Additionally, I seamlessly integrated the application with multiple providers for payment and delivery, utilizing my expertise in integration. I managed the AWS infrastructure using Terraform to ensure that the system was reliable, scalable, and secure while ensuring that the system ran efficiently within the constraints of our early-stage startup budget.
highlights: Led the architectural design and development efforts for multiple applications at Deliany, ensuring that the code was of high quality and delivered on time.
Ensured that the applications were reliable and that bugs were easily discoverable, making sure that the system ran smoothly for our clients.
Encouraged and facilitated engineer participation in improving the system, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.
Successfully handled high load spikes in traffic for the backend, ensuring that the applications were highly available and scalable.
Maintained a Google Lighthouse score of 90 or above, ensuring that page load times were fast and optimal for the end-users.
Kept the codebase clean and up-to-date with the latest libraries, ensuring that the applications were performant and secure.
Mentored and coached junior developers to improve their technical skills and foster a culture of continuous learning and growth.

work.summary: As a frontend engineer, I worked with React and BackboneJS before transitioning to a fullstack engineer role using Ruby on Rails. I played a key role in shaping the company's UI libraries, ensuring consistency and user-friendliness.
highlights: Successfully migrated a large Rails and BackboneJS codebase to React and Webpack, improving performance and maintainability.
Led the architecture of company-wide shared JavaScript libraries, with a specific focus on creating a robust and user-friendly React UI library.
Collaborated closely with designers, product owners, and stakeholders to create intuitive and responsive UIs that met user needs and business requirements.
Reduced page load times by 200% by optimizing package management and removing unnecessary dependencies.
Proactively addressed technical debt in a sustainable manner, resulting in a significant increase in company productivity.
Resolved backend issues, including slow queries and data corruption.

work.summary: At XAN, I was responsible for the architecture design and development of core features for two applications: a food listing platform and a retail management system. I utilized my expertise in PHP, Backbone.js, and Angular 2 to deliver robust, user-friendly solutions that met the needs of our company's products.
highlights: Demonstrated proficiency in working with multiple PHP versions, leveraging the most appropriate version for each project.
Spearheaded the design and development of a custom framework based on Phalcon PHP, providing a solid foundation for the company's products and enabling efficient development and scalability.
Mentored and managed junior engineers, providing guidance on best practices and fostering their growth as professionals in the field.
Designed and implemented a custom UI framework based on Angular 2, enabling the company to create visually appealing, responsive, and user-friendly products.
